chapters.title: Trump Teases 2024 Run, Stirring Media Frenzy
chapters.content: Donald Trump, using Tweet Company as his main communication tool, hinted at a possible return to politics. The former president shared a new 2024 campaign sign, sparking widespread speculation. Political analysts are now dissecting his second-term agenda, as he continues to address the public in campaign events. The media frenzy around Trump's potential run is palpable, with the public eagerly awaiting his next move.

chapters.title: Elon Musk Transforms Tweet Company into Superapp X
chapters.content: Elon Musk, having acquired a significant stake in the Tweet Company, has rebranded it as X. Musk's vision is to transform X into a superapp akin to China's WeChat. This drastic change has erased a recognizable brand overnight, causing a stir among users and brand experts. Despite the shock, Musk plans to introduce several new features to enhance user engagement and differentiate X from its predecessor. The public eagerly awaits the unveiling of these features, marking a new era in social media.
